title: The Thing (Duo Pack) [Ntsc] Ps2 Game + Movie
description:
The Thing (Duo Pack) Ps2 Game & Movie

PS2 Game The Thing                                Releashed, Aug. 20, 2002


Format:	      CD-R NTSC-USA
Lang.:	      English
Discs:         1
Image:         MDS/MDF
Requirements:  Modded/Chipped Ps2, or Swap Magic Disc method. 


Compressed with WinRar.  Game & movie was tested and works.

Try 7Zip its free google it, if you don't have WinRar.

This is a CD Type Ps2 game so you must burn with CD-R Media only.
(Verbatim recommened).


Note: No Ps2 Backup disc/game or Copy will work unless your Ps2 Console is
      Modded or if you use Swap Magic.


You could try the homebrew exploit to (Free Mc Boot - Also known as soft modding for ps2), if your ps2 system isn't hard modded with a chip or if Swap Magic isn't working as a last resort. There are ps2 emulators but its not 100% & the quality isn't as good as playing your game on your ps2 console.

If your using swap magic and don't have a flip top, you'll need to first
remove the front cover of the disc tray for use of the slide card.

Here's a link for how to remove the front cover...
     <a href="
http://www.modchipstore.com/support/index.php?_m=knowledgebase&_a=viewarticle&kbarticleid=49&nav=0,2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.modchipstore.com/support/index.php?_m=knowledgebase&_a=viewarticle&kbarticleid=49&nav=0,2</a>

And here's some links on using the slide tool to open the tray to swap in your ps2 copy or backup game.
     <a href="
http://www.swapmagic3.com/slide-tool/Instructions.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.swapmagic3.com/slide-tool/Instructions.htm</a>

http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/340944" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/340944</a>

http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/15105</a>

Those that don't have a modded Ps2 Here's a few links for Free MC Boot & how to use it to soft mod your ps2 so you can be able to play burned games. Free Mc Boot won't work on newer models of ps2 you'll have to use an older version the tutorial explains this.

-- <a href=" http://bootleg.sksapps.com/tutorials/fmcb/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://bootleg.sksapps.com/tutorials/fmcb/</a>

You will also need to patch the iso (the PS2 game) with ESR disc patcher GUI v0.24a if your using free mc boot with ESR Elf to boot your p2 copies or backups (No-swapping required for esr method).

After patching burn the iso with Imgburn or Dvd Decrypter to respectable media
then use the ESR through fmcb after you installed everything to boot your game.

You will still need to use the proper media for the game to run or load properly regardless if your using fmcb, a modded ps2, or swap magic. Try Verbatim DVD+R (Booktype to DVD-ROM), or Tayio Yuden, burn at 8x if its a 16x max. You really can't use Maxell DVD+R for example or some other brand as it more than likely will not work.

Note: If fmcb isn't working and your Ps2 isn't Modded, Try Swap Magic to load the game.


The Thing Duo Pack..Why not have the best of both worlds? Now you can watch the movie and be inspired to play the game! 

There will be some delay when you load up the game after the ps2 logo but just be patient wait and the game will load, don't panic and think image is bogus its not. 

The delay is the same as the original, its just the way the ps2 game was made so don't worry. 


Game Description:

The game begins where the movie ends.... After the enigmatic deaths of an American scientific expedition in the uncharted and frozen wastelands of the Antarctic, a military rescue team is sent in to investigate. Within these inhospitable surroundings the team encounters a strange shape-shifting alien life-form that assumes the appearance of people that it kills. The game brings fear and suspense to unimaginable levels, with a compelling plot and unique gameplay elements based upon action, evasion, trust and fear. Forget everything you ever learned about obliterating alien species with a simple barrage of violent ammunition ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ this monster is difficult to see, hard to kill, and seemingly impossible to evade. And when you actually see The Thing, 
itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s often too lateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦


Game Pics included.


Burn with Alcohol 120% (Included in download).

Set datatype setting to Playstation 2 and burn at 8x speed.

Use Tayio Yuden or Verbatim CD-R Media for best quality, or if other media isn't working.


Verbatim is properly your best bet and should work just fine.

Starring Kurt Russell

Movie:         DVD-Video
Image:         ISO
Rating:        R
Genres:        Science Fiction/Fantasy, Suspense/Horror and Thriller.
Requirements:  DVD Player, or PC DVD Player.



Movie Description:

The stage is set for havoc and terror when a twelve-man research team finds an alien being that has fallen from the sky and has been buried for over 100,000 years. 



Just Burn the ISO with ImgBurn or another burning software to a DVD-R
watch with DVD Player or Pc DVD Player & enjoy this great classic.


Pics included.

Any problems or questions with game or movie post a comment.
